Name: Team Size
Description: Number of developers assigned to a team

Name: Sprint Length
Description: Scheduled duration of a sprint in days

Name: Features per Sprint
Description: Number of features planned per sprint

Name: Budget Allocation
Description: Amount of budget allocated to project

Name: Developer Hours Per Week
Description: Work hours per developer per week

Name: Story Points Committed
Description: Total story points taken into sprint

Name: Feedback Sessions
Description: Number of stakeholder sessions per sprint
